page.title: 02SEA BANK
page.content: The bank has to be high enough to keep out the tide which can be as high as 8.5 meters. Sometimes when the bank is being built it is not high enough to stop the tide getting through and this bank is lost and work must start again. The bank they are working on now should be high enough to prevent any flooding behind it.This bank is over 1 mile long. In the first year after the sea wall is completed the rain washes the salt from the top inch of the soil and the salt level is reduced by approximatly 1"each year. In 7 years the soil is salt free. After all the creeks have been filled in the reclaimed land is grazed by sheep and cattle which helps to fertilize it:It is then ploughed and cultivated and put down to crops such as potatoes ,wheat or corn.
